JobTitle: Senior Manager of User Experience & Design
JobFullDesc: Senior Manager of User Experience & Design – Austin, TexasAre you driven by curiosity, moving forward, and opening new doors that lead down new paths? Are you always thinking about the next innovative product to bring to life?Dell's Experience Innovation Group is seeking talented designers, technologists, and strategists to collaborate and develop amazing experiences for our customers. We're looking for individuals who are passionate about working in an agile, diverse, global team, who can reimagine tomorrow and deliver solutions that solve real problems.As a team, we live to take risks, push boundaries, and stretch beyond the comfort zone – with a vision to create technologies that drive human progress.Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound impact as a Senior Manager of User Experience and Design working in Austin, Texas!What you’ll achieveIn this role, the Senior Manager of User Experience and Design will manage a multi-disciplinary team of UX design professionals focused on delivering the next wave of Dell Technology solutions. While collaborating with key engineering and business partners, you will define and drive exceptional user-experience design deliverables across software products and design initiatives. Working with other leaders across design, business, engineering and marketing, you will set strategic direction and coordinate UI design and research activities. Operationally, the Senior Manager will lead and manage all aspects of staff development, budgeting, tactical and strategic design and user research, with a strong emphasis on growing and mentoring some of the top design and research talent in the industry. Additionally, this role is expected to contribute to the broader Pan-Dell Experience Design Group’s leadership team as we craft best-in-class products and lead the industry’s most talented assembly of designers and UX professionals.Take the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table.
